plot: Nasty, constant rain. A man gets an unexpected visitor: A sparrow keeps him company over tea. The sparrow stays overnight, it almost gets cozy, but at some point the rain stops and the sun comes out again.
title: Yomayim Shel Geshem
plot_es: Nasty, constant rain. A man gets an unexpected visitor: A sparrow keeps him company over tea. The sparrow stays overnight, it almost gets cozy, but at some point the rain stops and the sun comes out again.
plot_en: Nasty, constant rain. A man gets an unexpected visitor: A sparrow keeps him company over tea. The sparrow stays overnight, it almost gets cozy, but at some point the rain stops and the sun comes out again.
